Ruban Mahadev

A Front-End Developer, Chennai | Bangalore

About Me

I’m a dedicated Front-End Web Developer with 1+ year of self-driven, hands-on experience in building responsive and user-centric web applications. Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like Angular and React, I’ve developed real-time projects focusing on clean design, performance, and scalable architecture. Skilled in integrating RESTful APIs, managing state, ensuring cross-browser compatibility, and creating reusable components. Experienced with Git-based version control, adhering to best practices in code management and collaboration.

What I Do

I help businesses and individuals build clean, fast, and responsive websites with a focus on modern design and best practices. Here are the areas I specialize in:

I create static websites that are clean, mobile-first, and fully responsive using HTML, CSS, and Tailwind. Ideal for portfolios, landing pages, and business sites.

I build dynamic, scalable single-page applications (SPAs) using modern frameworks like Angular and React, focused on performance and user experience.

I convert Figma or design mockups into pixel-perfect front-end code, ensuring consistent design across devices using Tailwind, SCSS, or CSS.
